channel.title: 3 Men and a Bible
channel.itunes:summary: Join Fr. Panagiotis Boznos, Fr. Nicholas Lionas, and Steven Christoforou for their weekly Orthodox Christian Bible Study. They're three friends who hang out every week and explore the Sunday Gospel and Epistle readings.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Explore the Sunday Scripture Readings
channel.itunes:author: Steven Christoforou, Fr. Panagiotis Boznos, Fr. Nicholas Lionas, and Ancient Faith Ministries

itunes:owner.itunes:name: Steven Christoforou, Fr. Panagiotis Boznos, Fr. Nicholas Lionas, and Ancient Faith Ministries

item.title: 3 Men and a Bible # 64 | Series Finale
item.description: Fr Panagiotis Boznos, Fr Nick Lionas, and Steve Christoforou meet for one last episode as they look back on their weekly Orthodox Christian Bible Study.
item.author: Fr. Panagiotis Boznos, Fr. Nicholas Lionas, and Steven Christoforou

item.title: The Theophany of Our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ
item.description: Steve, Nick, and Fr. Panagiotis discuss one of the Gospel readings for the Feast of Theophany, Matthew 3:13-17.
item.author: Fr. Panagiotis Boznos, Fr. Nicholas Lionas, and Steven Christoforou
item.itunes:subtitle: Steve, Nick, and Fr. Panagiotis discuss one of the Gospel readings for the Feast of Theophany, Matthew 3:13-17.
